name: Foosball (itch)
description:
Local multiplayer foosball for 4 players.

My most realistic table foosball simulator to date. Created to settle disputes in locations where a physical foosball table has yet to be set up. Experienced foosball players should be able to pick this game up right away as the controls are just like in real life.

Originally created as part of the Chainjam but never made the list due to no keyboard input.

You need 4 xbox360 controllers (Might work with ps4/xbone controllers, haven't tested it. If you do try it please post back results)

Left stick up/down - Move first row of players up and down.
Left stick right/left - Swing first row of players back and forward.
Right stick up/down - Move second row of players up and down.
Right stick right/left - Swing second row of players back and forward.

SoundFX by freesound.org users korgchops, cubix, starpause
Music by freesound.org user Questiion
